Package controllers

Class TicketController

java.lang.Object
controllers.TicketController
public class TicketController extends Object
This class is responsible for receiving and storing the information to be updated. The information is received from the respective ticket screens in the view package and stored in the attributes of the Database class.
Author:
Gabriel Fernando

  • Method Details

    • createTicket

      public static void createTicket(Float price, int seatTypeIndex, int seatNumber, int id)
      Method responsible for creating a new ticket based on the values received from the ticket creation screen.
      Parameters:
      price - the price of the ticket to be created
      seatTypeIndex - the index of the seat type to be returned
      seatNumber - the seat number
      id - the id of the itinerary to which the ticket should be added ser adicionada

    • updateTicket

      public static void updateTicket(Float price, int seatTypeIndex, int seatNumber, int ticketIndex, int id)
      Method responsible for updating the attributes of a ticket.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price of the ticket
      seatTypeIndex - the index of the new seat type of the ticket
      seatNumber - the new seat number of the ticket
      ticketIndex - the index of the ticket to be updated
      id - the id of the itinerary that contains the ticket

    • deleteTicket

      public static void deleteTicket(int ticketIndex, int id)
      Method that removes a ticket from the list of tickets of an itinerary, based on the provided ticket index and the itinerary that contains the ticket.
      Parameters:
      ticketIndex - the index of the ticket to be deleted
      id - the itinerary that contains the ticket

    • checkTicketData

      public static boolean checkTicketData(float price, int seatNumber)
      Method that validates if the price and seat number are greater than zero.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to be validated
      seatNumber - the seat number to be validated
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether the data is valid or not

    • getSeatType

      public static Ticket.SeatType getSeatType(int i)
      Method that receives an integer indicating the seat type to be returned.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the seat type
      Returns:
      the corresponding seat type

    • getUpdatingTicketIndex

      public static int getUpdatingTicketIndex()
      Method that returns the stored index of the ticket to be updated.
      Returns:
      the index of the ticket to be updated

    • setUpdatingTicketIndex

      public static void setUpdatingTicketIndex(int index)
      Method responsible for storing the index of the ticket to be stored, and also informing the edit screen.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the ticket to be stored
